# gitpretty

> Make your git history beautiful

## What is gitpretty?

A collection of bash scripts and GitHub Actions that add emojis to your git workflow - commits, branches, tags, logs, and stashes.

## Core Tools

- emoji-file-commits.sh - Add visible emojis to GitHub file browser
- emoji-commit.sh - Smart commits with auto-emoji detection
- emoji-log.sh - Beautiful git log viewer
- emoji-stash.sh - Stash management with emojis
- emoji-branch.sh - Create emoji-prefixed branches
- emoji-merge.sh - Merge with emoji messages
- emoji-tag.sh - Release tags with emojis
- emoji-hooks.sh - Git hooks for auto-emoji

## Quick Start

```bash
git clone https://github.com/nirholas/gitpretty.git
./gitpretty/emoji-file-commits.sh /path/to/repo
```

## Links

- Repo: https://github.com/nirholas/gitpretty
- Docs: docs/tutorials/SETUP.md
